alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:56PM EDT until July 19 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL EDGECOMBE AND SOUTHEASTERN HALIFAX COUNTIES... At 1256 PM EDT, a confirmed tornado was located 10 miles west of Scotland Neck, or 12 miles north of Tarboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Scotland Neck around 115 PM EDT. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
